mapper.insert: insert into Pet (customer_Index, pet_Name, pet_Type, pet_Gender, pet_Age, pet_IsNeutralized, pet_Weight, pet_History) values(#{ customer_Index }, #{pet_Name}, #{pet_Type}, #{pet_Gender}, #{pet_Age}, #{pet_IsNeutralized}, #{pet_Weight}, #{pet_History})
mapper.update: update Pet SET flag = 1 WHERE pet_Index = #{pet_Index}

update Pet set pet_Name =#{pet_Name}, pet_Type=#{pet_Type}, pet_Gender=#{pet_Gender}, pet_Age=#{pet_Age}, pet_IsNeutralized=#{pet_IsNeutralized}, pet_Weight=#{pet_Weight},pet_History=#{pet_History} where customer_Index=#{customer_Index} and pet_Index = #{pet_Index}
